website_summaries.verdict: If something absolutely need to be smashed, this hammer will definitely smash it. The 20 pound version is designed for heavy duty demolition, not everyday concrete busting around the home.
pros: 20 pound head great for intense demolition or workouts, other weights available
Rubber grip minimizes shock and vibration
Ideal for splitting logs with a wedge
cons: Hickory wood handle does not absorb shock well, tendency to break
Quality control issues with head-to-handle connection
May be too heavy for inexperienced home users

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust this handle.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used sledge hammers of various weights for several years but this one snapped into two pieces after very little use. I was breaking up some rock and it came apart where the shaft meets the metal. This is a useless tool and dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Great hammer to train with!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product! My boyfriend bought this to train with and improve his grip strength. Pluses Sturdy handle Durable
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Here comes the thor!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast. The product looks impeccable! I like the feeling of the hickory handle. Reasonable price for a 20lb sledge hammer. It gonna be a good tool for functional workout.
customer_reviews.author: xpingli

customer_reviews.title: Working Out with Real Tool
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a number of different exercises. It is really quality and if I ever need to use it for renovations, I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger E. Broome

customer_reviews.title: Big. Heavy.
customer_reviews.text: This is cartoonishly large and I love it. I use it for splitting wood, mostly. Even the toughest of logs stand no chance! The handle is hickory, and there is protective plastic near the head. Made in Mexico. Not for someone who does not wish to be sore after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Z. Batey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for metcon workouts on a tractor tire and after several hundred swings it gets brutal. Excellent product...well made and hopefully built to last. Time will tell, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Visitor

customer_reviews.title: A fine piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: A fine piece of equipment. It was too heavy for the students and the Seller was quick to accept the return. I thank the Seller for such accommodating practices, the quality, and the cost.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Shoveglove
customer_reviews.text: I swing this sledge around for 14 minutes a day, five days a week. It is ideal for the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Herron

customer_reviews.title: comically big
customer_reviews.text: I doubt this hits harder than my 10lb + some downward force, but is fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and handle feels great
customer_reviews.text: Handle feels great has a lot of grip on it, hammer is very heavy, just what ibwas looking for thank you
customer_reviews.author: cirilo reyes

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and heavy, but a real work out if used long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Faigle

customer_reviews.title: Sledge-O-Matic
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking product. Very well made. Have used it several times already. It is being used in the fire service. The handle grip is great. Especially critical when you need it on a ladder or a roof.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: This is my hammer...
customer_reviews.text: If you're running a hammer race this hammer will for sure make it more challenging. So pull up your working pants and go to work! Balance is totally off for being able to run with or properly swing, but it's totally awesome regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Handle broke very quickly. Didn't even hit the handle on anything. Just cracked under a small bit of pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Michael f.

customer_reviews.title: Great sledge`
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this to drive a wedge into wood for splitting and it works great. The handle is very tough; I've hit it a number of times full force on some logs, and I can barely even tell. If this thing ever wears out I'd happily buy another just like it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great sledge. Use it for crossfit and it's been awesome. Also crushed a 300lb rock with it no problems
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Cochran

customer_reviews.title: It is comically large. I think I need one ...
customer_reviews.text: It is comically large. I think I need one about ten pounds lighter for splitting wood, bit it is built very well. So I will probably be buying a lighter version of the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: The one to go with!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, super high quality. We've been putting it through its paces these past months and only have great things to say about this sledge. Great value at the price we paid!
customer_reviews.author: MindSpa

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is better than the one I purchased in the local hardware store. Great quality and thick handle. It gets used 5 days a week.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Hammered
customer_reviews.text: Yep its a sledge hammer. You can use it to go pound sand or any other project. Solid handle and firm construction. We use it with an ax for firewood and it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Best one on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Used it to break my old printer and OH MAN it was satisfying. Great present for loved ones.
customer_reviews.author: Hasan

customer_reviews.title: Strong, heavy well made.
customer_reviews.text: Strong, heavy, well balanced. Just what you want and need in a sledge hammer. I haven't used it much, but it sure will help me put the hammer down on those posts I'm going to put in around my garden this spring.
customer_reviews.author: cjmac

customer_reviews.title: Broken Handle
customer_reviews.text: This product was shipped with a broken handle. The wood was split from the hammer end to midway along the handle. Return window closed on this item last month so I’m stuck with it. Recommend a polymer handle if getting shipped by amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Truper 30929 8-Pound 36-Inch Sledge Hammer,...
customer_reviews.text: Works. Raise hammer, drop hammer, item is driven into the ground. Very little vibration and appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: DCLW

customer_reviews.title: Great sledge
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made hammer that also looks good. I have used it splitting hardwood with a steel wedge and no marks even show on the hammer face.
customer_reviews.author: Alan C. Judd

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good and Works as Hard as you do
customer_reviews.text: Excellent balance, very easy to grip and handle. The shaft protection is very robust and works well to keep from splintering the handle. Workmanship and fitment is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Berk

customer_reviews.title: ... to hit a tractor tire but so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Im just using it to hit a tractor tire but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY DUTY!
customer_reviews.text: Who needs a chain saw when you have one of these in your hands, you can bash the tree down! Works great with my wedges! LOVE SPLITTING LOGS IN THE LATE SUMMER!
customer_reviews.author: mr toad

customer_reviews.title: ...What a sledge it is
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job--watch your toes--cracks and pulverizes concrete slabs--watch your shins. Enjoy and be careful. If you are, the job will get done
customer_reviews.author: D. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Nice and solid sledge, this is a good tool
customer_reviews.text: Mostly using this for driving wedges through full wood rounds of ash and maple. The handle is solid and firm, wrapped in some neopreme non-stick stuff down where your hand grips it. This all improves one's confidence as your swinging while also softening the shock wave that travels down the handle from the head when it strikes the wedge. The head is solid, showing only minor impacts from my wedges - which makes sense as the wedges are designed to be of a softer metal than the sledge hammer. Well balanced and comfortable ... gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce P Osler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great buy, ain't man enough to swing much, but good deal
customer_reviews.author: Martha Charlene Richards

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for breaking up a few homemade 12" thick poured concrete platforms. Probably could have used a heavier model but this did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: foggyrock

customer_reviews.title: used it to demo a wall and worked great. Also used it to break up an old ...
customer_reviews.text: used it to demo a wall and worked great. Also used it to break up an old bathroom for a remodel. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Solidsolo

customer_reviews.title: Demolition BEAST!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a BEAST- works like a charm!!! Not too big and not too small- just perfect. I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: truthseeker

customer_reviews.title: Great sledge hammer
customer_reviews.text: It's a sledge hammer - looks like one and acts like one - not much more to say! It will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: wildfan

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sledgehammer. So much easier for me to swing ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sledgehammer. So much easier for me to swing around compared to the 10 lb that I use more rarely now.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Nice sledge hammer for the money
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. Nice handle. Especially like the guard on the handle near the hammer. Will save the handle from damage if you miss a swing. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Truper sledge hammer
customer_reviews.text: Seems well built. Haven't used it much yet. No idea on long time life of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Terril Stout

customer_reviews.title: best 6 pounder I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I'm a concrete contractor of 32 years, best 6 pounder I've owned. Buy it
customer_reviews.author: A.Sat

customer_reviews.title: Power
customer_reviews.text: Works well, however if you have a small frame, or not as fit, going down by two pounds might be better.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Brecht

customer_reviews.title: Nice sledge
customer_reviews.text: This thing does some damage... I have taken out walls and everything. Not a hint of damage to the sledge.
customer_reviews.author: William F. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: For splitting wood using metal wedges.
customer_reviews.text: Have broken several 6 lb. splitting mauls hitting metal wedges when splitting large chunks of wood. This tool is the way to do that. Love it. Bit heavier, but have already gotten use to the extra weight. Gives considerable more pressure also
customer_reviews.author: djp

customer_reviews.title: Drop the Hammer!
customer_reviews.text: A necessary tool for ANY person who needs to move something heavy. This sledge feels great in the hand, and pops a wheel off a car in NO time!
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Rion

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sledge hammer with virtually indestructible handle.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product. Well suited for major construction projects. The handle is what makes this product virtually indestructible. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Dobb

customer_reviews.title: Great hammer
customer_reviews.text: works good and have a good gripe AND it won't fall apart! I used it for almost a month and it still look good
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price tag.
customer_reviews.text: Also showed up 5 days after I ordered all the way to the top of Alaska.
customer_reviews.author: IF907

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sledge
customer_reviews.text: I use this for working out, not for heavy labor, however, I cannot recommend it more... It is comfortable, perfectly balanced, and easy to use. Done. Done. And Done.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelanne Gladden

customer_reviews.title: Great as an anvil.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect starter anvil. Too expensive to get an anvil shipped to Alaska. Can't say much about its quality as a sledge hammer, but it can take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: SooDoArt

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I like that this sledge hammer has some added protection below the hammer face where the handle meets and head. It helps absorb impacts from improperly placed strikes... :)
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very nice BFH.  Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to have a BFH around the house, just incase. When it arrived, I kind of regretted it because I didn't need it. But then, I had a wheel bearing on my jeep go bad. This thing came in handy to bash the crap out of the old rotor to get it loose. This thing is nice. I am batman.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. Very expensive compared to other 20 lb sledgehammers. Built well to.
customer_reviews.author: CC Malone

customer_reviews.title: Insufficient Engineering
customer_reviews.text: In approximately 50 swings and less then 10 minutes of work the handle broke off the head. The problem is the eye is disproportionate to the size and weight of the head, in that the eye is far to small. The handle is even tapered significantly just to fit into the eye. Truper needs to do some more engineering on this product line before anymore purchases should be made.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Good hammer
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid sledge hammer, i bought this to replace my wilton bash 20 lb hammer. The handle is sturdy and the head is well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: momandgrandma

customer_reviews.title: in hawaii this hammer is 98.56
customer_reviews.text: what a great deal , had to beat two death, two case 580 backhoe pins who were conspiring to retain the leaking outrigger cylinder, first round went to the pins, due to lack of sufficient firepower (big pin, small hammer). second round ended with knockout from truper, after demonstrating increased firepower (big pin, bigger hammer, bad intensions) . thanks again
customer_reviews.author: brad burgess

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the value
customer_reviews.text: Great workout, perfect for people interested in cross fit training. 20 pound sledge hammer is good for any active person who is around 140 to 200 pound
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Yao

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GOOD HAMMER BUT JUST A LIITLE LIGHT, BUT GETS THE JOB DONE..
customer_reviews.author: hank gayheart

customer_reviews.title: Great for workouts.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this sledge for construction, so I don't know how durable it is. It is definitely a great tool for working out though. I found over 20 different exercises I can perform with it on YouTube. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirkland Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty sledge. Work concrete and it makes short work of most. We call him John Henry
customer_reviews.author: JM Walls

customer_reviews.title: This appears to be a great hammer, but I have not used it yet
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a great hammer, but I have not used it yet. I'm sure it will do what I got it for!
customer_reviews.author: Pat L. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: Received a cheaper brand, MintCraft Pro which broke at the head after several dozen strikes.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin

customer_reviews.title: great construction! NOT **update**
customer_reviews.text: ****UPDATE**** This piece of junk broke after not too many uses. You would think for 50 bucks this would be able to handle some abuse. I didnt use it that often, and I used it today and THE DAMN HEAD FELL OFF. I guess it was my fault for buying something that was made in freakin Mexico.
customer_reviews.author: HATAZdropDEAD

customer_reviews.title: A..Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Ok 8lbs " its not to heavy, so you can keep pounding for a wile. Handels great A+
customer_reviews.author: BIGFOOT78

product_meta.title: Truper 30923 20-Pound Sledge Hammer, Hickory Handle, 36-Inch
product_meta.description: Style:Hickory| Size:20 lbTruper 30923, md-20h, 20 lb Sledge hammer, hickory handle, 36". 20 lb Sledge hammer for heavy demolition. 36" durable hickory handle is an industry standard for strength & comfort. Shock absorbent "poly guard" for overstrike protection. Pro-grade for commercial industrial, or residential use. Stock up on quality trooper tools for other projects today. Truper has been in the hand tool manufacturing business for over 40-year & is by far the largest Mexican company in its field. Truper relies on the most advanced modern & efficient technology to guarantee the optimum quality & value of its products & demanding service needs of the company's global customers.
feature_bullets: Md-20h, 20 lb sledge hammer for heavy demolition
36-inch durable hickory handle is an industry standard for strength and comfort
Shock absorbent "poly guard" for overstrike protection
Pro-Grade for commercial industrial, or residential use
Truper 30923, stock up on quality Truper tools for other projects today
